  physical_appearance: This is a white kebaya. The weaved fabric features a three-lobe floral motif. The edges are decorated with a floral border of bobbin-lace. The sleeves and bottom of the kebaya is elongated and tapered.

  subject_terms_1: tops (garments
 general) flowers (motifs) Peranakan bobbin lace blouses (main garments) folk costume

  subject_terms_2: Blouses Motifs Ethnic costume Peranakan (Asian people) Bobbin lace

  subject_terms_3: Peranakan costumes

  sgcool_label_text: This white kebaya is made from open-weaved cotton fabric with three-lobe floral motif. A floral border of bobbin-lace decorates the edges and tapers to a point. Kebayas with elongated tapered ends were popular in the 1930s and many were commissioned by Peranakan women. Its label reads ‘Na Sin Sie
 Cheribon’. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: This white kebaya is made from open-weaved cotton fabric with three-lobe floral motif. A floral border of bobbin-lace decorates the edges and tapers to a point. Kebayas with elongated tapered ends were popular in the 1930s and many were commissioned by Peranakan women. Its label reads ‘Na Sin Sie, Cheribon’. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
